Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
Summary: Bright light that look like car head lights in the sky.
divs: sighting details i read an article on the internet about "strange lights over carson california" and have seen something like what was reported. i live in carson near wilmington near 220th street. i lived in carson for 11 years now and just recently (the last 2 years) i have had a couple of ufo sightings in carson. one time a 1 1\2 years ago while pumping gas at arco across from the sheriff station i saw a red glowing pulsating object high in the sky. it looked like a sighting i saw in culver city in the early 80's, it was a bright white object that moved like a fire fly high in the night sky. but what concerns me is the recent sightings, which seems to be too close to home. at night (actually morning) about 1am - 5:30am (off and on) there is a strange light that (which source has to be coming from the north) only eliminating in a certain section of my bedroom. what is really eerie, it makes my ceiling fan glow a faint light. when i started looking for the light source i saw this brilliant light in the sky through my window (that resembled 2 car head in the sky) between 2 roof tops. the next day i started to look for possible light source (e.g. street lights, neighborhood light, and power lines) but i could not find a legitimate light source. this has been happening intermittently throughout the month. so this morning (12\26\2011 at 5am) when i saw this strange light shining on my wall i grabbed my cell phone and recorded the event about 3 times. then i found my cannon camera and recorded better video footage. so all together i recorded the event 6 times. to make sure i wasn't dreaming i woke up my daughter and she looked out my window and she saw the same thing. note: i did what i could to record this event, but the footage is not the best quality because i was recording inferior equipment (i.e., lg cell phone, and cannon digital camera), plus i recorded the event through my bedroom window which is dirty with finger prints, plus i was trying to record through some aluminum blinds, so there was a lot of jerky movement. i would have gone outside in backyard, but quite frankly i was scared. i would like to talk to someone about this before this is published (if it is published) to the public
